body_html:
tfe.Variable is a drop-in replacement for tf.Variable which has nothing to do with eager mode and will become the default eventually
…
On Thu, Apr 26, 2018 at 1:16 AM Jackie Loong ***@***.***> wrote: tf.Variable is so widely used that I don't believe we should use tfe.variable. Eager mode is just a small part of tensorflow and this approcach is not decent. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
tfe.Variable is a drop-in replacement for tf.Variable which has nothing to
do with eager mode and will become the default eventually

On Thu, Apr 26, 2018 at 1:16 AM Jackie Loong <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> tf.Variable is so widely used that I don't believe we should use
> tfe.variable. Eager mode is just a small part of tensorflow and this
> approcach is not decent.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
